name: World of Warships: Legends. Ultimate Texas
name_original: World of Warships: Legends. Ultimate Texas
description:
Everything's bigger with Texas!

Show your enemies no mercy with the powerful Battleship Texas and Hero Commander Willis Lee.
Also comes with a stack of supplies: boosters, camouflage, and currencies, as well as Premium time to help you in the game.

This Ultimate bundle includes:

• American battleship Texas
• Willis Lee commander
• 1,000 doubloons
• 1,000,000 Credits
• 30 days of Premium time
• 20 of each common booster type (100 total)
• 10 sets of Type 1 camouflage
• 10 sets of Type 2 camouflage 

NOTE: Certain contents will become available to you upon reaching a specific account level. Doubloons will be given as compensation for duplicate Premium ships.
